explanation: [0-0] On a gray checkered floor, there is a dark gray square hole. A pink pig walks over, and a red arrow appears above the hole.
[0-4] When the pig reaches the edge of the hole, it lifts its front legs, looking very scared, hurries back to take a closer look at the hole, and then walks away from the side of the hole.
[0-4] When the pig reaches the edge of the hole, it lifts its front legs, looking very scared, hurries back to take a closer look at the hole, and then walks away from the side of the hole.
[0-4] When the pig reaches the edge of the hole, it lifts its front legs, looking very scared, hurries back to take a closer look at the hole, and then walks away from the side of the hole.
[0-4] When the pig reaches the edge of the hole, it lifts its front legs, looking very scared, hurries back to take a closer look at the hole, and then walks away from the side of the hole.
[4-7] Subsequently, a yellow and black cat walks over and jumps over the hole without hesitation when it reaches the edge, then leaves.
[4-7] Subsequently, a yellow and black cat walks over and jumps over the hole without hesitation when it reaches the edge, then leaves.
[4-7] Subsequently, a yellow and black cat walks over and jumps over the hole without hesitation when it reaches the edge, then leaves.
[7-10] Immediately following, a brown, black, and white dog follows closely behind and arrives at the edge of the hole, playfully doing a somersault over the hole before leaving.
[7-10] Immediately following, a brown, black, and white dog follows closely behind and arrives at the edge of the hole, playfully doing a somersault over the hole before leaving.
[7-10] Immediately following, a brown, black, and white dog follows closely behind and arrives at the edge of the hole, playfully doing a somersault over the hole before leaving.

[10-16] At this moment, a green zombie wearing a blue short-sleeved shirt and dark blue pants walks over. The scene then switches to the pig, dog, and cat standing in a line, facing the camera. They then look at each other, and green, red, and yellow question marks appear above the cat, dog, and pig respectively. The background is a gray and yellow wall. The scene cuts back to the green zombie, who crouches by the hole and looks down. He then reaches out and moves it away, revealing that it is not a hole. A black glasses with white mosaic appears above and is put on his eyes, the zombie smiles triumphantly revealing white teeth. A red lens points at the zombie.
